programme.desc: Richard Ayoade is joined by actor Jon Hamm, star of Mad Men and Baby Driver, for a yuletide trek around Hong Kong - the most visited and most vertical city on the planet. They join the other 26.7 million tourists, as they gorge themselves on questionable foodstuffs, traditional transportation and the world's largest seated Buddha statue. After resting at the Peninsula Hotel for some colonial opulence, they sample street food and get their fortunes read, before taking to the air for a bird's eye view by helicopter

programme.title: Red Dwarf
programme.desc: Kryten discovers a developing fluid has mutated, causing photographs to come to life and giving Lister a chance to change the past and avoid ever becoming lost in deep space. Sci-fi comedy, starring Chris Barrie, Craig Charles, Robert Llewellyn and Danny John-Jules

programme.title: Red Dwarf
programme.desc: Kryten discovers his expiry date is less than 24 hours away, prompting Lister and Rimmer to organise a party he will never forget, but when the mechanoid decides to avoid being shut down he does not realise his actions could cost the rest of the crew their lives. Sci-fi comedy, starring Craig Charles and Chris Barrie

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Bank Holiday Monday sees the Essex contingent arrive for a sunny day at the beach in Barry. Gavin has a heart-to-heart with his dad, which gives him much to think about, while a dark cloud looms on the horizon when Dave arrives to find Nessa and Smithy enjoying all the fun of the fair. Mathew Horne, Joanna Page, James Corden and Ruth Jones star

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Preparations for Nessa and Dave's wedding are in full swing, Stacey has life-changing news for Gavin, and Bryn and Jason put their big secret to bed once and for all. Finally, the wedding arrives and, as Nessa prepares to make her way to the church, Smithy takes the opportunity to have one last chat. Mathew Horne, Joanna Page, James Corden, Ruth Jones and Rob Brydon star

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee does jury service and joins 11 other jurors in the jury room to debate whether the accused is guilty or not. It may seem simple enough, until Lee decides to put the other jurors on trial. Lee Mack stars, with Colin McFarlane, Samantha Spiro and Jocelyn Jee Esien

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lee organises a family camping trip in an attempt to bring the generations together. However, even though he remembers to bring his guitar for campfire sing-songs, he forgets to check the weather. When Lucy finds something in the woods that looks very much like a human bone the unhappy campers cannot wait to leave. Comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Host Rob Brydon and team captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack return with previously unseen material from the ninth series of the comedy panel show. programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: When Lee joins Facebook for the first time and is contacted by an ex-girlfriend from 20 years ago, Lucy is annoyed that she cares so much. Her feelings are complicated by the sudden reappearance of a friend from university with whom she had a brief relationship. Threatened by fond memories from the past, Lee and Lucy start behaving badly. Comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: The clan's visit to the Second World War graves in Normandy gets off to a bad start when Lucy discovers that her grandfather was not the man she thought he was. In short, this seems to be a piece of family history best left buried. Comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: A family Christmas party turns sour when Lucy announces that she has got tickets to see Jason Donovan in Panto. Lee loathes Panto - especially given the Aussie actor was Lucy's teenage crush. That night, Lee has an unsettling dream in which he is dressed as Buttons and his whole life has turned into a Pantomime. Lucy is Cinderella, Toby and Anna are the Ugly Sisters, Geoffrey is Baron Hardup and Wendy is Fairy Godmother. Worse still, Prince Charming - the handsome suitor who pursues Cinderella and asks for her hand in marriage - is Jason Donovan. Can Buttons keep the fairy-tale couple apart? Festive edition of the comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton, and featuring a guest appearance by a certain former soap star

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain
programme.desc: Fred meets fellow traction engine enthusiasts in Staffordshire and visits an old friend who is restoring a triple expansion engine at Bratch Pumping Station. He also takes a tour of the trains on the Severn Valley railway and learns about the history of mining in the Black Country at the Living Museum

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain
programme.desc: Fred watches a traditional chain-maker at work and visits a copper mine, before discovering how the metal sheets produced would be transformed through a spinning process. He also takes a trip to the Ffestiniog railway, built to transport slate, where he rides on the footplate of a 19th-century train and sees the world's oldest working steam engine

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off from Newcastle on the final leg of his journey from Derby to Lindisfarne, finding out about the world's earliest swing bridge and its inventor William Armstrong. He also travels by boat from the port of Seahouses to examine the story of lighthouse keeper's daughter Grace Darling, who, along with her father, rescued nine people from tumultuous seas in 1838. On the Holy Island of Lindisfarne, Michael explores the lime kilns and finds out how Christianity spread from here across northern England in the 7th century

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a new journey following his Bradshaw's handbook from south-west Wales to Cambridge, beginning in Pembroke Dock, where Queen Victoria's royal yachts were built. In the little market town of Naberth he investigates what caused rebels to dress up as women, later spending the night at an inn in Carmarthen where Horatio Nelson once met Emma Hamilton. Next day, the former politician pitches in with the volunteers who look after the Gwili Heritage line and ends his leg in Swansea, where he learns how to pose for a photograph in Victorian style

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Charleville, Co Cork, to the city of Waterford, along the way finding out about the ancient art of making butter, attempting to learn the basics of Ireland's oldest game, and riding on the Duke of Devonshire's Victorian railway

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the next leg of his journey from Co Kerry to Galway, Michael Portillo travels from the city of Kilkenny to Athy in Co Kildare. programme.desc: Michael Portillo begins underground at Big Pit coal mine in Blaenavon, where he discovers how Victorians toiled night and day to power the Industrial Revolution. programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo arrives in Manassas, Virginia, scene of two crucial battles during the American Civil War. In Fredericksburg, he tries bottling bourbon corn whiskey and learns how it became the nation's spirit. In Richmond, the ex-politician enjoys a tour of the Virginia state Capitol building, where he hears of the dilemma faced by one of its most famous sons, General Robert E Lee, before donning his dancing shoes for a Cotillion ball. Michael ends his journey in Jamestown, the first permanent English settlement in North America

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his American rail journey west to Jefferson City, Missouri, following the tracks of European settlers in the 19th century. In St Louis he ascends America's monument to the Wild West, the Gateway Arch, the tallest free-standing monument in the US. On the banks of the Missouri River, the political commentator is invited aboard a replica of the original keel boat used for an historic expedition. In Washington, Missouri, Michael tries to craft a corn cob pipe, and in Jefferson City he finds an huge fortified building that served as the gaol for the entire Wild West

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey westwards across the United States, discovering the hidden pleasures of 19th-century railroad workers in Sedalia and learning more about the birthplace of ragtime. He then travels to Paola, Kansas, where he auctions livestock and dines on spare ribs, before reaching his destination in St Joseph, Missouri

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: In Lawrence, Kansas, Michael Portillo joins the Jayhawks basketball team in the famous Allen Field house stadium with energetic encouragement from their cheerleaders, before travelling through Tornado Alley to Topeka to meet one of the first storm chasers in America. Driving out on the Great Plains, Michael learns about the Tallgrass Prairie and comes face to face with a herd of wild buffalo

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo reaches Colorado, where he follows in the footsteps of 19th-century east coast men who came to experience the cowboy life. programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys

However, revealing the inspiration behind her starter might be a step too far for her guests, especially after the revelations found inside her 'special' cupboard!

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts Laura and Nick dream of making a permanent move to Spain with their beloved dog Poppy. They're after a property in Estepona on Spain's Costa del Sol that meets both their needs and Poppy's. Property expert Jean Johansson lines up five options for their £160,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: House hunter Zane wants to permanently relocate to Mijas in Spain to be closer to his son Dean, who has already moved there with his family. Danni Menzies shows the father and son five properties within the £110,000 budget, hoping at least one will prove perfect

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: In 2010, architectural designer Lincoln Miles and artist Lisa Traxler found an uninspiring 1970s bungalow on a plot on the Isle of Wight surrounded by ancient woodland. As part of their renovation project, they added a three-storey 'tower' extension and used a range of unconventional techniques and alternative materials. Two years later, Kevin McCloud returned to find out whether the couple's methods led to success

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
programme.desc: In Bradford, West Yorkshire, Michelle is tired of the abode she shares with Andrew. The bungalow, set in rolling hills, is small and was only supposed to be a temporary home - that was a decade ago. However, Andrew loves this place. Kirstie tries to convince Michelle to stay by solving her kitchen problem and adding some feminine touches to the decor. Phil, meanwhile, has found a selection of amazing properties to buy - including a bungalow that's twice the size and a barn conversion with lots of outside space

programme.title: In the Footsteps of Killers
programme.desc: Emilia Fox and criminologist David Wilson investigate the disappearance of 13-year-old David Spencer and 11-year-old Patrick Warren, who went missing in Birmingham on Boxing Day in 1996. To this day, no one has been charged with the double disappearance and murder of the two friends, and their bodies have never been found despite two major police investigations and a missing persons campaign that featured the boys' pictures on milk cartons. But now, Emilia and David discover new evidence leading to a prime suspect

programme.title: Passengers (2016)
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.desc: The second host in Edinburgh is 69-year-old grandmother Katy, who is hoping that her out-of-season Xmas Tartan-themed evening will put her guests in a yuletide mood

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Glamorous solicitor Aisling hosts the third dinner party in Edinburgh and throws a traditional Irish party, with a piper at the door to welcome her guests

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: American writer Harry serves up a menu inspired by family on day four in Edinburgh - but the evening starts with a bang and does not get any less surreal thanks to Katy's stories

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: t's the final night in Edinburgh, hosted by food and fashion-conscious Bruce. All week Bruce has expressed his desire for the finer things in life and his dislike of anything that falls below his high standards, so expectations are high. Can Bruce pull the evening off with style, and will he do enough to grab the cash?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Having just retired, Carlene Barnard wants to buy a holiday home on the Costa Blanca so that all of her family - two kids, six grandchildren and one great grandchild - can spend quality time together in the Spanish sunshine. Scarlette Douglas shows her and daughter Kerrie five properties for £90,000 in and around the seaside town of Torrevieja

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Michelle and Gary Cole from Birmingham have both suffered from ill health over the past few years and have decided that the rejuvenating effects of the Spanish sun are just what the doctor ordered. They're looking for a holiday home where they and their two kids can spend quality time together. Laura Hamilton shows them five properties on the Costa Blanca for their £65,000 budget

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Spain, a bike tour business gets ready for 50 Belgians. A flat tyre adds to a family's woes in Portugal, while cameras encounter a couple who are swapping one new life in the sun for another

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the first dinner date in Middlesbrough glamorous 41-year-old sales assistant Gail hosts a night full of sparkly gourmet grub and teaches her guests a lesson or two in beauty. Her guests are 52-year-old vintage shop owner Jane, 28-year-old football coach Dan, 57-year-old art enthusiast Julie and 47-year-old pub landlord Gary. Gail gets the glitter, sparklers and hair extensions out, but whether her food will get glowing reviews ramins to be seen

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Goalkeeping coach Dan hopes to thrill his guests with a James Bond evening in Middlesbrough, including 007-inspired food and a Bond villain. however, Julie and Jane fail to 'bond' on the night, falling out over everything from who's been the best James Bond, to how to pronounce Roger Moore. Gary and Gail also fall out when the table chat turns to 'lookey-likeys'. After dinner, Dan challenges his guests to put one past him in a penalty shoot-out, which ends with a surprising result

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Middlesbrough, pub landlord Gary plans a 1980s evening, serving classic dishes with a modern twist. However, Jane and Julie are still bickering and Gary falls out with Gail over his dessert. Showman Gary flambés his steaks at the table, and tops things off with a magic display that goes down well with all of his guests - except one

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Vintage shop owner Jane serves up a retro menu and a vintage clothes competition in Middlesbrough. Jane's been on the attack at the table so far, but she's planning to be the perfect host this time. On a lively night, there's more drama between the diners, and Julie and Gail discover that Jane has created headlines in the local news

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the last night in Middlesbrough, Julie's Indian menu gets mixed reviews, while Gail and Jane make a shoe discovery that leads to some shocking dinner table revelations. Gary finds out how much he's got on Jane's nerves throughout the week, as the contestants candidly reveal what they think of each other

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin goes house-hunting in and around the attractive Spanish town of Chiclana de la Frontera on the Costa de la Luz, with chauffeur company owner Steve and export co-ordinator Janice. They both have busy lives and can't wait to buy their own holiday home that they can escape to for relaxing getaways with their family. They have a budget of £160,000 and are looking for a three-bedroom villa with a pool near the beach

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Cornwall couple Marc and Matt fell in love with Majorca the moment they stepped onto the island six years ago and are now looking to buy their very own holiday retreat that they can escape to at a moments notice. programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: George returns to a grand Victorian villa in Ormskirk to follow the next stage of its renovation. Having previously created a luxurious master en suite, his next task is to tackle the giant kitchen and utility area. He also visits a typical Victorian mansion block in London. Although structurally sound, the flat has been virtually untouched over the years. The result is dismal and depressing with a spare room that feels like a prison cell. Can George mastermind a plan to free up this criminal waste of space?

programme.title: The Dog Academy
programme.desc: Cockapoo Maggie and German shepherd Cody are brought in by their owners Diane and John, who have grown tired of Maggie's diva-like ways and cannot understand why she hates her pooch companion. Meanwhile, muzzled collie Marvin has left owners Laura and Dave at their wits' end. They are concerned by his lunging and nipping and fear he'll eventually bite someone. As trainer Jo begins the delicate process of earning Marvin's trust, there's no knowing how he'll react

programme.desc: The sword-wielding saviour of Spanish California returns after 20 years in prison, tutoring a thief to take over his heroic role and tackle corrupt government officials, who are using slave labour to mine gold illegally. Both mentor and pupil have personal scores to settle with their enemies, led by a ruthless governor and a psychotic military officer. Swashbuckling adventure, with Anthony Hopkins, Antonio Banderas and Catherine Zeta-Jones

programme.desc: An American teenager obsessed with kung fu movies is sent back in time to ancient China, where he joins the battle to free the imprisoned Monkey King. The only problem is he has no martial arts skills of his own, and will need the assistance of two legendary warriors to become the hero he needs to be. Martial arts adventure, starring Jet Li and Jackie Chan

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: The hospital struggles with a huge backlog of untreated patients from the night shift, as staff have a hard time ensuring that everyone is discharged or admitted within four hours of arrival. An 85-year-old motorist is treated for a severe head injury after skidding on ice, her car ending up on its roof. A woman who tripped while shopping fears that a broken ankle will jeopardise her plans to go on a cruise

programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: A toddler is rushed in with suspected sepsis, a life-threatening condition that attacks the organs, and a large team of specialists administer high-strength antibiotics. Elsewhere, advanced nurse practitioner Cheryl is looking after 57-year-old Michael, who has come in with severe abdominal pain, and an 87-year-old woman is rushed in after being knocked over by a car

programme.title: Don't Tell the Doctor
programme.desc: The medics help a woman who ended up in hospital after too much exercise and dieting, a Cardiff woman with a bowel problem and a singer who sweats too much

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: A one-off edition of the documentary in which journalist Nick Wallis reveals how CCTV and technological advances are helping to ensure convictions. Nick visits Stafford to meet seasoned CCTV operator and ex-police officer Barbara, who helps catch a drug user after spotting him on camera. Plus, control room operative Chris is on the lookout for regular shoplifters in Woking, while mild-mannered Jo foils a gang of thieves in Huntingdonshire

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage)

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives probe the shooting of a motorist, and arrest a man who helped the victim change a tyre on his car shortly before he was killed. The suspect protests his innocence, and points the investigators in the direction of another man who admits to the crime and even signs a confession, but further inquiries cast doubt on his guilt. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the death of a book editor who was reputedly having an affair with one of her authors, and find themselves focusing on the lover's long-time companion, whose alibi turns out to be a tissue of lies. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a model and discover splashes of blood that obviously did not come from the victim, but suggest the culprit is a relative. With Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Ross investigate when a restaurant becomes the scene of a shooting, and discover one of the diners is concealing a desire for revenge. Unfortunately, the object of their suspicion has a clever defence already up her sleeve - and only an expert witness can break her story. Sam Waterston and Carey Lowell star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A charity worker with a secret appetite for sordid encounters dies at the hands of a serial killer, but the defendant constructs a unique case by claiming the crime was the result of exposure to excessive violence on television. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Carey Lowell

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when a male nurse is found beaten to within an inch of his life - but as they draw closer to their prime suspects, the shocking motives for the attack become clear. Gritty police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Tony reviews satellite footage of rebel forces in the Middle East and spots Kersey among a group of insurgents, concluding that Joe Westcott's fear of him was well-founded. Back at HQ, Abby creates a 3D computer model of the attack that occurred in Afghanistan and Joe dons a virtual-reality headset to relive the traumatic events. Will it jog his memory?

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Teenager Lydia Wade manages to escape a gang of masked men trying to abduct her and her friend Rosie, the daughter of a US Navy commander. Lydia's Navy captain father David Wade was shot dead during the attack and her mother is overseas, so Ziva offers to look after the girl, while Abby tries to jog her memory by creating facial reconstructions of the attackers based on some grainy CCTV footage. DiNozzo and McGee find links on Rosie's laptop to possible suspect John 'Diesel' Stevens

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is called to the scene when there is an attempt on the life of FBI agent TC Fornell, with the assailant identified as Navy seaman Tyler Brown. The pair team up and visit the bar where Brown worked and bump into their mutual ex-wife Diane Sterling, who was operating undercover as an employee suspected of stealing customers' identities. Joe Spano and Melinda McGraw guest star

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny and Jackie investigate an attempted acid attack on prominent TV reporter Melanie Maines - and are stunned to discover Frank has been having a secret fling with her. Meanwhile, Jamie's undercover mission puts him in danger when he learns of a gangland killing - and discovers he could be framed for the crime. Guest starring Margaret Colin (The Devil's Own)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A number of fertilised embryos are stolen from a sperm bank and the team's investigation reveals several unhappy customers - as well as a couple of outspoken anti-fertility activists who liken such clinics to death camps. Before long, Benson and Stabler have their suspects in custody - but a shocking turn of events at the courthouse turns the case into a murder. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson goes undercover in a prison to investigate a teenage girl's claims that a guard raped her and has been threatening her jailed mother. Posing as an inmate, she tries to find evidence that systematic abuse is taking place - and faces a terrifying ordeal in the basement of the facility. Starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An accusation that a teacher coerced a 15-year-old student into having sex with her is met with the counterclaim by the now-pregnant woman that she was raped. Novak obtains a warrant preventing her from securing an abortion and subsequent DNA tests confirm the boy as the child's father. Huang's suggestion that a personality disorder drew her to the youngster is undermined by incriminating evidence that casts new light on the case. Guest starring Melissa Joan Hart (Sabrina the Teenage Witch)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the attempted murder of a woman found beaten into a coma, and their only witness is her daughter, who has severe learning difficulties. The spotlight soon turns on the victim's husband, who claims to have found his wife on his return home from a business trip - but the airline passenger list reveals he was not on the flight. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: An old enemy of Angie fakes his own death, then hires her to investigate who is trying to kill him. Guest starring William Shatner

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Two surprise sniper attacks on the NYPD leave the SVU squad scrambling for answers. When the link between the shootings appears to be Detective Tutuola, he reconnects with his former Narcotics partner to uncover a possible motive tied to their old cases. As the violence continues, Lieutenant Eames joins the investigation and the unit races to hunt down a killer no one saw coming

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. In Hammersmith, west London, camera operators help police as they try to enforce a drinking ban on a local park and spot a group whose members may be about to break into a shop

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Confidential files are leaked by an anonymous hacker, who threatens to release more unless the Navy agrees to renew a contract with a struggling shipbuilding firm. The Navy Secretary suspects the company's owner Philip Wickes is to blame, and asks NCIS to join forces with the PsyOps unit in an elaborate ruse to bring the culprit out of hiding. Meanwhile, Gibbs' colleagues begin to notice his attraction to his opposite number Samantha Ryan. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Vance's brother-in-law Michael Thomas is linked to the murder of a petty officer, and Gibbs is placed under pressure to clear the man's name. Meanwhile, a negative performance review leaves Tony feeling downhearted and he resolves to prove the assessment wrong by being less chatty while on duty. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Rocky Carroll

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine lieutenant's body falls from the sky and the team links the man's death to the disappearance of a Navy chaplain thought to have been kidnapped by rebels working with Colombian crime cartels. Ziva and Tony are dispatched to conduct a rescue operation and enlist the help of former Interpol agent Monique Lisson, while Gibbs discovers there was more to the chaplain's outreach mission than meets the eye. Crime drama, guest starring Karina Lombard (The L Word) and Jamie Lee Curtis (A Fish Called Wanda)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis discover a man leading a secret double life when they investigate who opened fire on a group of people disembarking from a party cruise. A major dispute erupts when Schiff confronts the governor and attorney general over the decision to seek the death penalty. Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A pizza delivery man is murdered, causing trouble when the two suspects point the finger at the other. Though one of the pair is taped admitting to the crime, his Catholic priest uncle forbids the team from violating the sanctity of the Confessional. Drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Investigations into a stolen credit card lead Briscoe and Curtis to a pair of teenage lovers who may have killed their newborn son and disposed of the body. The couple strenuously deny any wrongdoing - but the discovery of a decomposing baby's finger adds weight to the evidence against them. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis come up against the Mob when a Mafia gangster-turned-FBI witness is found dead, and the investigation is hampered when the only lead fails to leave any evidence. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The fatal stabbing of a psychologist draws Briscoe and Curtis into a heated divorce case and pits McCoy and Ross against a manipulative attorney who puts results before professional ethics. Award-winning American police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate when a student is shot dead after a party gets out of control. The victim's boyfriend is arrested, but the officers later receive a tip-off about someone else - a vengeful youth deliberately infecting girls with HIV. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Returning from a six-month posting in the Gulf, Navy lieutenant commander Megan Huffner opens her front door to find her husband Noel dead in his chair. Gibbs and the team investigate and find the victim died three or four weeks earlier, and an unusual $100 bill in his wallet proves to be a vital clue. Meanwhile, Tony's father visits for Christmas and looks to rebuild their fractured relationship. Guest starring Robert Wagner

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. A man and his son on a fishing trip hook what appears to be the body of a petty officer, but the dead man turns out to be a journalist who had been investigating the proliferation of drugs in the Navy. Meanwhile, Ziva returns to her car after a workout at the gym to find her father Eli hiding inside. Guest starring Michael Nouri

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. After the deaths of two family members of NCIS employees, the team identifies the killer as a Swedish mercenary and the ballistics report reveals the bullets came from an Iranian arms dealer. McGee traces a wire transfer made to the hitman's ex-wife and son to an account under the name Virtue, and Ziva makes a connection after realising what the Hebrew translation is

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called to the scene of a fatal car crash involving marine lance corporal Chad Dunn and student Lyla Cutwright. Duckie notices that the woman's injuries do not match the specifics of the accident and there are no skidmarks found at the scene, leading Gibbs to declare they possibly have a murder and a suicide on their hands. Abby calls in sick for the first time after the case stirs up a traumatic incident from her childhood. Mark Harmon and Pauley Perrette star

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investment banker is found dead and suspicion falls on his boyfriend, a professional American football player desperate to keep his sexuality a secret. However, details of the case later appear in the media, calling Benson's relationship with the Press into question. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni, with Bill Pullman (Torchwood)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are drawn into a series of psychological games by Merritt Rook (guest star Robin Williams), an engineer whose obsessive hatred of authority proves popular with the public and wins him a cult following. Hard-hitting drama, with Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A student counsellor is murdered in New York, and Benson and Stabler investigate a possible connection to her volunteer work at a refugee centre. They discover she had been helping a taxi driver who claimed to have been tortured after the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001. The trail soon leads the detectives to suspect the involvement of a doctor with links to a company that benefitted financially from the Iraq war

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A college student is murdered in an attack bearing all the hallmarks of a notorious serial killer. Stabler and the team believe it is the work of a copycat and their investigation leads them to a group of loyal followers, including a man who glorifies the crimes in his comic books

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A teenager beats a fellow foster home resident to death, and his lawyer seeks a not guilty vedict, claiming the youth is genetically predisposed to violent behaviour because he possesses an extra Y chromosome

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After making a seemingly routine arrest of a man exposing himself in Central Park, Rollins has a bad feeling that they could be dealing with far more than a minor public offender and calls upon ADA Barba and the entire SVU squad to investigate. A shocking theory comes to light and the situation rapidly escalates, and Benson is put in mortal danger

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote

programme.desc: Jessica tackles a case in Osaka, Japan, where a motorcyclist romancing the daughter of a traditionally minded family finds his life on the line. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.desc: Foul play disrupts preparations for a charity concert organised to save Maine Woods from dastardly developers intent on lining their own pockets at the expense of the environment. Jessica infiltrates the high-decibel world of rock music to investigate

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica examines a recent murder which the police are reluctant to investigate, and discovers a link between the killing and an abduction 11 years previously. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Disaster strikes on the set of a TV sitcom when the producer is killed in cold blood - leaving Jessica to determine whether one of the show's actors might have done the deed, or if somebody else bears a grudge. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica is on hand to help a puppet designer when he runs into difficulties with his own creations - but after a security guard is killed, she finds herself on the trail of a murderer. Detective drama, guest starring Malcolm in the Middle's Bryan Cranston, with Angela Lansbury

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica Fletcher tackles a mystery involving a diamond, a dog and an old grudge while on holiday at a friend's lodge in the Grand Teton mountains. A surly visitor who threatened to reveal some scandalous information about her friend is found dead. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: La Brea
programme.desc: A massive sinkhole opens in the middle of Los Angeles and hundreds of people, vehicles and buildings are pulled into its depths. The survivors find themselves trapped in a mysterious and dangerous, while a family separated by the tragedy look for ways to reunite. Sci-fi mystery, starring Natalie Zea and Eoin Macken

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: A distraught mother persuades JJ and the team to investigate when a man kidnaps three teenage girls and tells his captives two of them may leave - but they must choose which one will be killed. Starring AJ Cook and Mandy Patinkin

programme.desc: The BAU team travels to Seattle while on the hunt for a serial bomber who has been targeting centres of automated technology throughout the city, and enlists the aid of a science fiction author whose novel is being used as a guide by the terrorist. Starring Thomas Gibson and Mandy Patinkin

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The body of a pregnant woman is found in a burnt-out building, triggering an investigation that leads the team to suspect a wealthy coffee trader and his son may be responsible. The case eventually goes to court, but a mistrial is declared - to the dismay of Novak, who vows to fight on regardless

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

Drama, starring Adam Beach, Ice-T and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Logan suspect a missing infant may have been killed by her parents rather than kidnapped, and their inquiries lead them to uncover a terrible family secret relating to a mentally ill serial killer. Award-winning police drama, starring Chris Noth and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Roswell Conspiracies
programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: Zodiac Master casts a spell that makes a suit of armour come to life

programme.title: Dork Hunters from Outer Space
programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times.

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times.

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home.

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: A gang is planning to steal the Crown Jewels and also to kill Mannering, replacing him with a man who has undergone plastic surgery to become his exact double

programme.title: Pet Island
programme.desc: Documentary introducing some of Ireland's most pampered pets and their besotted owners, examining how the animals have become central to the family unit. Jacqueline Hopkins from Castlebar attends a photo shoot with a sick ferret, Kildare couple Martin and Jennifer get their dogs ready for competition and a Belfast pug becomes an internet celebrity

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert heads to Norfolk to explore the county's lowland rivers, which are a haven for wild plants and creatures including kingfishers and crayfish. Ray also goes in search of water voles, whose population is in sharp decline

programme.title: The World's Most Incredible Hotels
programme.desc: The most extraordinary, iconic, and luxurious hotels ever built, taking in 26 destinations across 18 countries

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: William decides to take Mary's advice and lose a few pounds, while the object of his affections is relieved to be given another chance at work, on the condition that she make herself available for night calls. It's a busy time at the funeral parlour, as three teenagers are killed in a car accident, and Molly seizes the opportunity to move closer to her daughter. Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham and Cheryl Campbell

programme.title: The Devil's Disciple (1959)
programme.desc: The black sheep of a family is befriended by a minister. A case of mistaken identity leads both men to discover their true vocations during the American War of Independence. Historical drama based on George Bernard Shaw's play, starring Burt Lancaster, Kirk Douglas and Laurence Olivier

programme.title: Tiara Tahiti (1962)
programme.desc: Two chalk-and-cheese British Army officers decide to settle a long-standing grudge in a Tahitian resort during peacetime. Comedy, starring James Mason and John Mills

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: A new manager arrives at the recently built Whitbury leisure centre - but things get off to a shaky start when he selects a poolside attendant who cannot swim. First episode of the comedy, starring Chris Barrie

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: Its good to look up when your exploring London, there's a great deal to be discovered! But on the streets of Bloomsbury the pavements have secrets imbedded in them

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: Sara Dane
programme.desc: Historical drama about a woman transported to a penal colony in Australia for a crime she did not commit

programme.title: Hitler's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Exploring Hitler's range of bomb and bullet-proof Mercedes cars, which saved his life on numerous occasions

programme.title: The Steal (1994)
programme.desc: An American computer expert arrives in London to execute a hi-tech robbery from a bank whose chief executive has a hand in many dodgy deals. Crime comedy, starring Helen Slater, Peter Bowles, Alfred Molina, Stephen Fry and Jack Dee

programme.title: Honour (2014)
programme.desc: A Muslim girl is forbidden from seeing her boyfriend by her traditional parents, but she defies them and the couple run away together. The girl's mother feels the family has been dishonoured, and hires a mysterious bounty hunter to track her down and carry out punishment for her disobedience. Thriller, starring Paddy Considine and Aiysha Hart

programme.title: Mr Pip (2012)
programme.desc: A teenage girl in war-torn Papua New Guinea finds comfort in the story of Charles Dickens' Great Expectations taught to her by her English teacher. However, her actions have unforeseen consequences when an army sent to destroy the rebels becomes convinced the mysterious Pip is their leader. Drama, starring Hugh Laurie and Xzannjah Matsi

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days

programme.desc: Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Whilst the Baron is doing his best to copy Eddie's mannerisms, a close friend of the deceased spots the deception. The gang now force Mannering to help them steal the Crown Jewels

programme.title: Europe's Wilderness
programme.desc: A journey of discovery to a wonderful world of breath-taking views and endangered species, with each episode focusing on one animal and its lifestyle, needs and habitat

programme.title: Fearless Mr Fox
programme.desc: Vilified as vermin by some and admired for pluckiness by others, the fox divides public opinion. State of the art tracking technology reveals how foxes exploit human environments

programme.title: Sara Dane
programme.desc: Historical drama about a woman transported to a penal colony in Australia for a crime she did not commit

programme.title: The Trap (1966)
programme.desc: A woman is sold to a trapper in 19th-century British Columbia and reluctantly becomes his wife, overcoming her initial fears to nurse him through an illness. Drama, starring Oliver Reed, Rita Tushingham and Rex Sevenoaks

programme.title: No Place for Jennifer (1950)
programme.desc: A nine-year-old girl is traumatised by her parents' divorce, and is sent to a home for troubled children. Drama, starring Leo Genn and Rosamund John

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh learns how to make Chinese zong dumplings from her mother Christina, and finds out what it's like to work a shift in the kitchen of Andre Ursini's busy restaurant

programme.title: Poh & Co
programme.desc: Poh and Jono choose a big range of plants at the nursery, meet an adventurous young chef and get some help from their friends and neighbour

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: Reluctant hero Monkey is accused of murdering a girl and her family, leaving Tripitaka with no choice but to send him home _ but it later emerges that demons are responsible for his plight

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: William is distraught to learn his mother has suffered a serious stroke, and rushes to the nursing home to see her, arriving just before she dies. Admitting their relationship was not always a happy one, he resolves nevertheless to give her a send-off she would be proud off - only to receive shocking news at the reading of her will. Elsewhere, Molly strives to make amends with Mary, but she has enough to worry about in the form of a teenage girl about to give birth. Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham and Cheryl Campbell

programme.title: Dickensian
programme.desc: Compeyson comes closer to getting his hands on Amelia's inheritance when she invites him to the shareholders' meeting, confident she will need his assistance in running the business. Inspector Bucket makes a shocking discovery at Croucher's Warehouse, giving him enough evidence to arrest Fagin for the murder of Jacob Marley. Peter gives his savings to his mother after seeing her weep over Tim's poor health, and Mrs Gamp may have outstayed her welcome with Silas

programme.title: Mistresses
programme.desc: Dan finds out about Katie's affair and Jack asks him to keep the secret from Megan, who soon discovers what has been going on. Richard and Lucas join Trudi for her daughter's sports day, while Siobhan vows revenge on Tom, despite his threat to release the photos of them if she walks away. Mark begs a pregnant Jessica to take him back and cancel her abortion appointment

programme.title: Eden Lake (2008)
programme.desc: A couple on a romantic break find their peace shattered by a gang of youths who steal their belongings and vandalise their car. However, when they confront the youngsters they are subjected to a horrific attack, resulting in a deadly game of cat and mouse through the woodland. Horror, starring Kelly Reilly and Michael Fassbender

programme.title: Mysterious Creatures (2006)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, starring Timothy Spall and Brenda Blethyn as the parents of a woman with mental health difficulties. When their daughter's hostile behaviour and the authorities' lack of support become too much to handle, the couple decide to commit suicide together, writing a letter to a local newspaper to explain the reasons behind their actions. The cast also includes Rebekah Staton and Judy Flynn

programme.desc: Mannering's assistant, David Marlowe, is abducted from the shop and a ransom demanded for his return

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Number Two subjects Number Six to a ruthless week-long interrogation in a bid to persuade him to reveal why he resigned from his job. Penultimate episode of the vintage drama, starring Patrick McGoohan

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: A prize-winning Maine Coon needs a new home as it is feeling stressed out living in such a large group of other cast, so Clare tries to help owner Claudia find a suitable one

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.title: Hitler's Bodyguard
programme.desc: Exploring Hitler's range of bomb and bullet-proof Mercedes cars, which saved his life on numerous occasions

programme.title: Tiara Tahiti (1962)
programme.desc: Two chalk-and-cheese British Army officers decide to settle a long-standing grudge in a Tahitian resort during peacetime. Comedy, starring James Mason and John Mills

programme.title: Seance on a Wet Afternoon (1964)
programme.desc: A self-professed medium with a greed for money and publicity arranges the kidnap of a wealthy industrialist's daughter, with the intention of winning acclaim and the ransom when she locates the child using her alleged psychic powers. British psychological thriller, starring Kim Stanley, Richard Attenborough, Mark Eden, Nanette Newman, Gerald Sim and Judith Donner

programme.title: Dance With Me, Henry (1956)
programme.desc: The owners of a struggling amusement park get mixed up with the Mob as one struggles to pay his debts and the other faces losing his adopted kids. Comedy, with Abbott and Costello

programme.title: The PWA World Tour
programme.desc: We meet some of the world's top professional windsurfers as they slalom their way through the Sea of Galilee in Israel in this showcase event

programme.title: Touched by Auschwitz
programme.desc: Feature-length documentary marking the 70th anniversary of the liberation of the concentration camp by Red Army troops. Laurence Rees travels to Jerusalem, Chicago, London, Bavaria, Krakow and Tel Aviv to talk to six survivors, along with their friends and families, who discuss the problems, challenges and triumphs they have experienced since the end of the Second World War. Among those interviewed are Tadeusz, who became a doctor but still had to fight persecution by communists in Poland, and Hermann, who went on to become a successful antiques dealer in Bavaria, but still suffers from recurring nightmares

programme.title: Mistresses
programme.desc: Dan finds out about Katie's affair and Jack asks him to keep the secret from Megan, who soon discovers what has been going on. Richard and Lucas join Trudi for her daughter's sports day, while Siobhan vows revenge on Tom, despite his threat to release the photos of them if she walks away. Mark begs a pregnant Jessica to take him back and cancel her abortion appointment

programme.title: An Affair in Mind (1988)
programme.desc: A writer is drawn into a dangerous affair with a woman trapped in an unhappy marriage. However, as their relationship develops, she pressures him into murdering her husband. Thriller based on Ruth Rendell's novel The Face of Trespass, starring Amanda Donohoe and Stephen Dillane

programme.title: Honour (2014)
programme.desc: A Muslim girl is forbidden from seeing her boyfriend by her traditional parents, but she defies them and the couple run away together. The girl's mother feels the family has been dishonoured, and hires a mysterious bounty hunter to track her down and carry out punishment for her disobedience. Thriller, starring Paddy Considine and Aiysha Hart

programme.desc: Arsenal v Southampton (Kick-off 8.00pm). Live coverage of the Premier League clash from Emirates Stadium, as Mikael Arteta's team look to take another huge step towards a first title since 2004. The previous meeting between the two clubs back in October saw the visitors claim an unexpected 1-1 draw against the Gunners. Stuart Armstrong's second-half goal cancelled out Granit Xhaka's 11th-minute opener to give the Saints a point
